title: full effect to Regulation (EU) 2022/612 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 

(Mobile Telephone Roaming) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 9 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european community (mobile telephone roaming) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 9 june 2023

title: full effect to Regulation (EU) 2022/612 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 2. The European Communities (Mobile Telephone Roaming) Regulations,
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Mobile Telephone Roaming) Regulations, 

2022 (S.I. No. 315 of 2022) are amended by - 

(a) 

the deletion of Regulations 6(4) and 7, 

(b) 

the substitution of the following Regulation for Regulation 8 - 

“Service of notification or direction
text_norm: 2 european community (mobile telephone roaming) regulation 2022 (s.i no 315 2022) amended - (a) deletion regulation 6(4) 7 (b) substitution following regulation regulation 8 - service notification direction

title: full effect to Regulation (EU) 2022/612 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: (1) Where
text_raw:
8. 

(1) Where 

issues a direction or 
notification under these Regulations, such direction or 
notification shall - 

the Regulator 

(a) 

be in writing, 

(b) 

state the reasons on which it is based, 

(c) 

be addressed to the undertaking concerned, and 

(d) be sent or given as soon as practicable. 

(2) 

Section 60(1) of the Act of 2002 shall apply to a 
direction issued by the Regulator under these Regulations 
as if it were a notice referred to in that section.”, and 

(c) 

the insertion of the following Regulation after Regulation 9: 

“Obligations of undertakings
text_norm: 8 (1) issue direction notification regulation direction notification shall - regulator (a) writing (b) state reason based (c) addressed undertaking concerned (d) sent given soon practicable (2) section 60(1) act 2002 shall apply direction issued regulator regulation notice referred section (c) insertion following regulation regulation 9 obligation undertaking

title: full effect to Regulation (EU) 2022/612 of the European Parliament and of the
heading: 10. An undertaking shall comply with -
text_raw:
10. An undertaking shall comply with - 

(a) 

its obligations under Articles 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10, 
11, 12, 13, 14, or 15 of the Mobile Phone 
Roaming Regulation, 

(b) 

a requirement of the Regulator under Article 17 
of the Mobile Phone Roaming Regulation, and

(c) 

a direction of the Regulator under Regulation 
3(2).”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 June, 2023. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for the Environment, Climate and 
Communications.
